sources.title: 2307: Winter's Dream (SCI FI ACTION FILM in German complete, Sci Fi Films)

metadata.Plot: The year is 2307 A.D. The Earth is frozen over and virtually uninhabitable. The remaining humans live underground, unable to survive the sub-arctic temperatures. With no "man power," scientists bio-engineered Humanoids that possess great strength, speed, and tolerance to extreme cold. When a rogue humanoid escapes and threatens to lead a rebellion against mankind, an elite team of soldiers, led by decorated killer Commander Bishop, must hunt and kill the fugitive.
metadata.Actors: Paul Sidhu, Arielle Holmes, Branden Coles
